item.title: NotFeed-RSS Reader on GitHub
item.description: NotCraft::NotFeed An RSS reader running entirely from your GitHub repo. Free hosting on GitHub Pages. No ads. No third party tracking. No need for backend. Content updates via GitHub Actions. Customizable layouts and styles via templating and theming API. Just bring your HTML and CSS. Free and open source. No third-party tracking. How to use it? Github Pages Use the NotFeed-Template generate your own repository. In the repository root, open Config.
